Title: Waives any interest, penalties, or other charges for late payment of property taxes due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Suffolk county
Summary: Waives any interest, penalties, or other charges for late payment of property taxes due to financial hardship caused by the COVID-19 pandemic in Suffolk county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to waiving any interest, penalties, or other charges for late payment of property taxes due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Suffolk county
